website_summaries.verdict: With plenty to create in this Frozen LEGO set, including a revolving staircase, playground, and sleigh, this will keep creative fans entertained for a long time.
pros: Includes Anna and Elsa mini-doll figures
Build Elsa’s ice palace, Marshmallow the snow monster, and much more

customer_reviews.title: Nice LEGO..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my daughter’s birthday..she loved this present so much..
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Wow, Wow
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this set. Compared to your typical Lego set, this one is huge. It is pretty tall and has some nice interactive details. The parts were well thought out and look amazing when assembled. The attention to details were amazing. The instructions were easy to follow and sequenced well. Overall we are happy with this set, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lilith

customer_reviews.title: A lovely Lego Frozen set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely Lego Frozen set. I think I like the original Elsa's Ice Castle more, but it's still pretty nice. The way the front doors open is a bit weird though. After building it, I took it apart along with my Elsa's Ice Castle, a few other Frozen sets ( I think I have them all) and used a few regular blocks to combine them all into a big large Ice Castle. It turned out lovely, though the instructions version is beautiful too. :) If you're a fan of Frozen and Legos, I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L-Gecko

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My child who likes anything related to Frozen loves this castle. Since she is too young, I had to assemble for her but she spends hours playing with this castle! It’s very pretty as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lausanne04

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old really wanted this and we let her get it. She did so great putting together half this castle herself! I love that the directions are pictures. It's a great way to get young people to learn how to follow directions. My daughter loves her castle, she plays with it often!
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it already was opened before
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it already was opened before ((( very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Of course she loves anything Frozen related, but she wanted LEGOs for Christmas. So I got her these. She has built the castle and it's still going strong. I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kd7ctv

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 4 years old grand daughter loves it, assembled first time with help of her father, but now disassembles and assembles it again herself. It was great gift for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: 175 pages of picture instruction over 900 parts -
customer_reviews.text: not a value for the $$$ too many parts can be easy to step on in the middle of the night or get caught in the vacuum cleaner. Not something the average 11 year old girl can assemble by herself. Took a team of 3 to get assembled and it took all evening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for "Frozen" fans.
customer_reviews.text: The castle is smaller than I expected, but my 4 year old granddaughter is delighted with it. Her 6 year old brother had no trouble with the assembly

product_meta.title: LEGO Disney Princess Elsa's Magical Ice Palace 43172 Toy Castle Building Kit with Mini Dolls, Castle Playset with Popular Frozen Characters including Elsa, Olaf, Anna and more (701 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Help your young Disney Frozen fan replay scenes from Disney’s Frozen and Frozen Fever with a grand Ice Palace. This cool toy LEGO l Disney playset for kids features a 2-story palace with special sliding bridge, revolving staircase and kitchen with table and chairs, an outdoor playground with snow fort, tree and working seesaw, plus a 3-carriage sleigh. Children can have hours of fun and imaginative play with this holiday gift set that comes with Elsa and Anna mini-dolls, plus Olaf, Marshmallow and 4 Snowgie minifigures.
feature_bullets: Build a sparkling ice palace with revolving staircase and sliding bridge to recreate favorite scenes from the Frozen movies or reimagine them in new and exciting ways!
Includes LEGO l Disney Frozen Elsa and Anna mini-doll figures, plus Olaf, Marshmallow and 4 Snowgie minifigures for fun adventuring possibilities

Elsa's Magical Ice Palace measures over 12-inch (31cm) high, 11-inch (30cm) wide and 7-inch (19cm) deep; Playground with snow fort measures over 2-inch (6cm) high, 7-inch (20cm) wide and 1-inch (4cm) deep; Sleigh with carriages measures over 4-inch (12cm) long and 1-inch (3cm) wide
701 pieces – A cool building toy for boys and girls aged 6+ and for fans of Disney Frozen and kids of all ages

This LEGO l Disney Frozen Elsa’s Magical Ice Palace 43172 building kit makes a great Christmas present for kids and can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and bricks for more creative play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars546 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
